name: Rhythm Planet: A Student Developed Video Game
blurb: The music plays, you time the beats, and map your path. When you have mastered the rhythm and felt the power, it is time to mine.

rewards.reward: Digital downloadable copy of the finished game DRM free on PC and Mac.
Set of 4 Official Miner Men Corps stickers and a digital downloadable copy of the finished game DRM free on PC and Mac.
Digital download of the Rhythm Planet soundtrack and a digital downloadable copy of the finished game DRM free on PC and Mac.

PDF version of the Rhythm Planet Book filled with 40+ full color pages of concept art and more. A digital download of the Rhythm Planet soundtrack and a digital downloadable copy of the finished game DRM free on PC and Mac.

Official Miner Men Corps recruitment poster autographed by as many students as we can round up, a PDF version of the Rhythm Planet Book filled with 40+ full color pages of concept art and more. A digital download of the Rhythm Planet soundtrack and a digital downloadable copy of the finished game DRM free on PC and Mac.

Awesome Karl of the miner Men, Karl's jr. or Karl-a-tron 2500 T-shirt. Claim any one of the six examples as your own. A PDF version of the Rhythm Planet Book filled with 40+ full color pages of concept art and more. A digital download of the Rhythm Planet soundtrack and a digital downloadable copy of the finished game DRM free on PC and Mac.

Pick any 2 T-shirt designs,  a PDF version of the Rhythm Planet Book filled with 40+ full color pages of concept art and more. A digital download of the Rhythm Planet soundtrack and a digital downloadable copy of the finished game DRM free on PC and Mac.

Celebrity Game Packs. Chose Game Pack One \u2013 Fat Elvis, Tighty Whitey Sasquatch, Napoleon Bonapenguin, or perhaps you are more of a Celebrity Game Pack Two person. That pack features, Space Dracula, The Galactic Bandit, and Astro Joan of Arc. No? Alright we understand. You are the Space Pirate type. If so then Celebrity Game Pack Three is for you. Also, pick any 2 T-shirt designs,  a PDF version of the Rhythm Planet Book filled with 40+ full color pages of concept art and more. A digital download of the Rhythm Planet soundtrack and a digital downloadable copy of the finished game DRM free on PC and Mac.

We want to put you in the suit! Karl who needs him?  Not us. Send us a picture and you can play as you. Plus any 2 T-shirt designs,  a PDF version of the Rhythm Planet Book filled with 40+ full color pages of concept art and more. A digital download of the Rhythm Planet soundtrack and a digital downloadable copy of the finished game DRM free on PC and Mac.

Design your own Celebrity Game pack. Always felt a need to play a game featuring flying nuns. We feel you and we can make that happen. You name the persons of note and we will make them characters in the game. Plus any 2 T-shirt designs,  a PDF version of the Rhythm Planet Book filled with 40+ full color pages of concept art and more. A digital download of the Rhythm Planet soundtrack and a digital downloadable copy of the finished game DRM free on PC and Mac.

Always wanted to be a game designer. We are here to help. Design your own level. Pick any available zone and design a level for it. Torture others with your genius. We cannot wait to see what you come up with. Plus any 2 T-shirt designs,  a PDF version of the Rhythm Planet Book filled with 40+ full color pages of concept art and more. A digital download of the Rhythm Planet soundtrack and a digital downloadable copy of the finished game DRM free on PC and Mac.
